subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: As a pinch-hitter, Boston’s Jarrod Saltalamacchia hit a two-run homer off closer Fernando Rodney with one out in the ninth inning to give the Red Sox a 3-2 win over the Tampa Bay Rays.
snippet: As a pinch-hitter, Boston’s Jarrod Saltalamacchia hit a two-run homer off closer Fernando Rodney with one out in the ninth inning to give the Red Sox a 3-2 win over the Tampa Bay Rays.
